name: css-tree
description: CSSTree is a tool set to work with CSS, including fast detailed parser (string->AST), walker (AST traversal), generator (AST->string) and lexer (validation and matching) based on knowledge of spec and browser implementations

scripts.lint: jscs data lib scripts test && eslint data lib scripts test && node scripts/review-syntax-patch --lint && node scripts/update-docs --lint
scripts.build: npm run gen:syntax && browserify --standalone csstree lib/index.js | uglifyjs --compress --mangle -o dist/csstree.js
scripts.travis: npm run lint-and-test && npm run coveralls
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- -R min && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls
